column1: 14.  It  is  evident  that  the  appellant  in  a  drunken  rage  has  gone  to  the
residence of PW 04. Upon his arrival, the deceased along with a crowd
of 10 or more others have gathered around the appellant. This crowd
including the deceased have been armed with blunt weapons such as
poles.  Furthermore,  PW  04  has  conceded  that  the  individuals  in  the
crowd could have had other kinds of weapons also, that she was unable
